title: Add Binary Compat Checker to CI
body:
Mentioned in PR review today. @KirillOsenkov [created a tool](https://github.com/KirillOsenkov/MetadataTools/tree/main/src/BinaryCompatChecker) that can check binary compat based on an app.config and a directory that contains dll's.

We should consider adding it somewhere as automation so we don't get a surprise breakage.

nodes.body: At a glance, I agree this can be closed.
